page.title: 07MID SUSSEX TRANSPORT
page.content: The main road through our block is the A272 (which runs through square 3623) and it runs through Scaynes Hill. The other well-used road is Church Road,which goes under the Bluebell Railway.The A272 comes from Haywards Heath and goes on to Lewes.Traffic is heavy on this road while leaving our block.Church Road branches off the A272 in Scaynes Hill.It passes the Sewage Works and Nash Farm.The only station in our block is owned by the Bluebell Railway,and the stop is at Freshfield Halt.The trains carry roughly 250000 to 300000 passengers through our block,per year.There are 12 steam engines in working order.County buses pass through our block,but not very often.This is because there is only 1 village of any size;Scaynes Hill.
